Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: ferris wheel

A large circular ride that lifts bucket seats in a large circle. The bucket seats are attached to a cross beam of a large circular frame. This frame rests on an axle, which is turned via a crank to the side. Two large attendants operate this ride.
A large circular ride that lifts bucket seats in a large circle.

axle of the ferris wheel
The axle of the ferris wheel is made of thick, sturdy oak lumber. It supports the entire ride while turning the large frame.

frame of the ferris wheel
The large circular frame of the ferris wheel is the skeleton of this ride. It is made of thick, sturdy oak lumber and looks to be strong.

bright purple bucket seat

A bright purple bucket seat is attached to the frame of the ferris wheel. This seat is large enough to comfortably sit 2 large occupants. The black leather cushions provide comfort and a security bar makes sure the occupants don't fall out of the ride.
